com.facebook.litho

Class TransitionsExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.rendercore.extensions.MountExtension<TransitionsExtensionInput>
      • com.facebook.litho.TransitionsExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransitionManager.OnAnimationCompleteListener<Function<TransitionEndEvent>>, UnmountDelegateExtension

    public class TransitionsExtension
extends MountExtension<TransitionsExtensionInput>
implements TransitionManager.OnAnimationCompleteListener<Function<TransitionEndEvent>>, UnmountDelegateExtension
    Extension for performing transitions.
